DITEM.name: Frame
DITEM.text: is dedicated to the Wintop application frame and to command integration, as well as to main interactivity.

PITEM.name: AfrFoundation
PITEM.text: is the main framework that provides classes to deal with the basics of Wintop Frame, such as workbenches, command headers, windows, and cameras.

PITEM.name: AfrInterfaces
PITEM.text: exposes interfaces to Wintop objects such as workbenches, add-ins, and command headers and includes the main behavior interfaces such as CATIEdit and CATIUIActivate.

PITEM.name: AfrSelection
PITEM.text: deals with the compass and contextual menus.

PITEM.name: AfrStandard
PITEM.text: includes classes and interfaces to manage the Tools Palette and interruptible tasks.

PITEM.name: CATIAApplicationFrame
PITEM.text: includes classes and interfaces to manage application and object properties.

PITEM.name: InteractiveInterfaces
PITEM.text: is mainly dedicated to the Search, and to layers and layer filters.
